def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 2):
        for x,y in permutations(config):
            check_xy_large = all([is_large(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y]])
            check_xy_dark = all([is_dark(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y]])
            check_xy_close = is_close(x, y, ctx)
            check_xy_vertical = is_vertical(x, y, ctx)
            if (
                check_xy_large
                and check_xy_dark
                and check_xy_close
                and check_xy_vertical
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x,y]))
    return results
state = turn(state)
